ROW.DESCRIPTION: Two pass report page setup option, means the full report will be calculated before printing the first page (to use PAGECOUNT feature for example)
Refers to item as a drawing element (printing item 1 of 250)
Specifies if the expression should accumulate values (aggregate), posible values are general, group or page
Identifier property for TRpExpression, allows the access from any other expression to the value it contains
String not used in current version, mapmode is a Windows GDI concept, device is screen or printer
Vendor Library is the client library file (.dll or .so) provided by the database manufacturer
Substitute cadena for s, that is (s is the source string), here we are describing use of Substring function
Female means the word genere (female or male) of resulting string (spanish: un euro, una peseta), in english word numbers have no male/female meaning
Virtual printer, printer used usually to print reports, any kind of printer
This is not a message the user will see, only when a bug occur, means the report metafile is bad
An error occured when reading the image, usually because bad data
Before adding a connection, the user must select the connection type first.
Default barcode value, don't translate
For charts, this expression will determine when a new serie of values is required
Determines is serie change must occur when Serie Change exp. evaluates to true,or when the value changes
For Charts, the expression to determine the caption for the value obtained
Get Value condition, if this condition is false the value for the chart is not obtained
Open Cash drawer (money drawer) and a sample sequence code to generate pulse to open it
Another sample
Cash drawer (money drawer)
Currently not used, but in a future, open a report from a TCP/IP report server for modification
The user see a tree of folders and reports (report library), create a report in the selected folder (branch of the tree)
Graphic indentifier is a string, the same string introduced in Identifier property of the TRpChart component to be cleared
Inserting a value to a chart should include the value, the caption for it, a indicator to change to a new serie and the caption of the new serie
Message used in applications that require NT/2000/XP/2003, any NT based OS, Win9x does implement system services (Report server service)
First range of values to build a filter to a table of values in a Borland Database Engine Table
Property of some sections,a section (detail for example) can have a child subreport, a subreport that will be printed just after (bellow) the section.
A section can skip to any page and any page position, before printing it or just after printing it.
Skip to page expression, if the section have a value of 1, the engine will countinue the process of the report but from page 1 (without removing data)
Two report pass in needed when PAGECOUNT,Skip to page or other is used, all pages remain in memory until the report is fully calculated
The engine will not ask Operating System font sizes (no GDI) and/or data. In Linux this allow printing in console mode, without X-Server
Mybase driver allow the merge of other datasets (any driver), with sorting and grouping capabilities, one of the source alias have not found.
The datasets to be combined (union) must have the same number of columns (field count)
Before printing, the cash drawer will be opened if available
Same after printing
Prints not using printer driver but sending text directly to printer por/queue as raw data (very fast using pos and dotmatrix printers)
Standar input/output is a unix concept, useful in command line tools,sample: cat report.rep | printreptopdf -stdin sample.pdf - In Windows use type
Client side unions is the merge of two or more datasets by the reporting engine (Mybase driver) instead server side (SELECT ..UNION SELECT)
A label, bellow the user must specify wich dataset alias want to merge/union
Fields to group if required (fields not grouped are usually numeric fields) GROUP BY feature client side
Text justify, GDI/QT implement Left/Right/Center text justification, this is full justify (LEFT and RIGHT), avail.in PDF only.
ADO Connection String is a Microsoft Data Access concept, connection string is used by Visual Basic and others to connect to databases
